title: Sins of the Son
description: I can have my rival's boss' daughter—or I can take her the hard way.My enemy left me no choice:His daughter I never knew.I am a hitman. My father's a mob boss. I'm a gangster.Not some thug.I need the streets and a woman’s touch.My family doesn’t know it yet, but our lives are about to change.Jessica Lombardi is bellissima ragazza. Esuberante!And best of all…Vergine.So from now on, we’re going to do things my way.It starts with us...Ending our families' bloodshed over New York City, once and for all...
author: Frank Lucianus
